section.name: Configuration
section.p: Once the your DSA/Catalog web application has been installed, a link to its front page should be visible from within the Tomcat Manager interface, or you can visit http://<hostname>:<port>/<webapp-name>/, where <hostname> is the fully-qualified name of the machine where tomcat is installed, <port> is the port on which tomcat is installed, and <webapp-name> is the name of the war file you installed (minus the .war suffix).

In the left-hand navigation menu of your installed web application, you will find a link called "Configuring your DSA/Catalog". Visit this link for detailed instructions about configuring your DSA/Catalog installation to export your own RDBMS data, and registering it in the Virtual Observatory.
